description: This file is the main source code for a FastAPI backend API that manages integration with Jira and Confluence, including OAuth flows, user management, and placeholder fetch endpoints. It defines all API routes, OAuth callbacks, user operations, and data models, serving as the core logic for the project.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _ocean_response(data: Any, message: str = "ok")
methods.description: Wraps responses in a standardized structure with status, message, and data.

methods.name: health_check()
methods.description: Performs a health check returning a status indicating the service is healthy.

methods.name: jira_login(state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Starts the OAuth flow for Jira by redirecting to Atlassian's authorization URL.

methods.name: jira_callback(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles OAuth callback from Jira, exchanges code for tokens, and updates user info.

methods.name: create_user_endpoint(payload: UserCreate, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates a new user or returns an existing user based on provided data.

methods.name: list_users_endpoint(db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Returns a list of all users.

methods.name: get_user_endpoint(user_id: int, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves a user by its internal ID.

methods.name: confluence_login(state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Starts OAuth flow for Confluence similar to Jira.

methods.name: confluence_callback(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles OAuth callback for Confluence and updates user tokens.

methods.name: connect_jira(db=Depends(get_db), payload: UserCreate | None = None)
methods.description: Guides client to initiate OAuth login for JIRA integration.

methods.name: connect_confluence(db=Depends(get_db), payload: UserCreate | None = None)
methods.description: Guides client to initiate OAuth login for Confluence integration.

methods.name: fetch_jira_projects(db=Depends(get_db), owner_id: int | None = None)
methods.description: Placeholder endpoint returning stored JIRA projects; simulates fetch.

methods.name: fetch_confluence_pages(db=Depends(get_db), owner_id: int | None = None)
methods.description: Placeholder endpoint returning stored Confluence pages.

methods.name: upsert_jira_project_endpoint(payload: JiraProjectCreate, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates or updates a JIRA project linked to a user.

methods.name: list_jira_projects_endpoint(owner_id: int, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Lists all JIRA projects for a specified user.

methods.name: upsert_confluence_page_endpoint(payload: ConfluencePageCreate, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates or updates a Confluence page associated with a user.

methods.name: list_confluence_pages_endpoint(owner_id: int, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Lists all Confluence pages for a specific user.

ctags.name: confluence_callback
ctags.pattern: /^async def confluence_callback(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, /
ctags.signature: (request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: confluence_login
ctags.pattern: /^def confluence_login(state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None):$/

ctags.name: jira_callback
ctags.pattern: /^async def jira_callback(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state:/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: jira_login
ctags.pattern: /^def jira_login(state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None):$/
